# Description: This program renders Project-2 and outputs the documents

rmarkdown::render("Project-2.Rmd", 
                  output_format = "github_document", 
                  output_file = "WorldAnalysis.md",
                  output_options = list(
                    html_preview = FALSE,
                    toc = TRUE,
                    toc_depth = 2
                  ))
